metadata.name: Raccine Uninstall
metadata.comment: Detects commands that indicate a Raccine removal from an end system. Raccine is a free ransomware protection tool.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('taskkill ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('raccinesettings.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delete')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('raccine tray')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('schtasks')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/delete')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('raccine rules updater'))))

output.summary: Detects commands that indicate a Raccine removal from an end system. Raccine is a free ransomware protection tool.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate deinstallation by administrative staff Reference: https://github.com/Neo23x0/Raccine
